title.en: Jimiko na Mitsuba-san ga Boku wo Yuuwaku Suru

altTitles.ja: 地味子な三葉さんが僕を誘惑する

altTitles.en: The Plain Mitsuba-san Is Tempting Me
Villain Is Here
Me, the Heavenly Destined Villain
The Villain Of Destiny
My Fate As a Villain

description.en:
Immediately after Gu Changge realized he had transgressed into a fantasy world, the world's protagonist, and fortune's chosen, vowed to take revenge on him. Envied by all, not only is the female lead head over heels for him, but he's also treated as a distinguished guest wherever he goes. Fortunately, Gu Changge's prestige and power are superior to everyone else's, so shouldn't it be easy to trample on a mere fortune's chosen?

Hold on… There’s a system dedicated to milking and harvesting the protagonist? Gu Changge smirked. “Seems like even fate wants me to fulfill my destiny as the villain of this world!”
description.fr: Dès que Gu Changge s’est rendu compte qu’il avait transgressé un monde imaginaire, le protagoniste de ce monde, l’élu de la fortune, a juré de se venger de lui. Envié par tous, non seulement la femme principale est folle de lui, mais il est également traité comme un invité de marque partout où il va. Heureusement, le prestige et le pouvoir de Gu Changge sont supérieurs à ceux de tous les autres, alors il ne devrait pas être facile de piétiner un simple élu de la fortune ?
description.id:
Begitu Gu Changge menyadari dia telah masuk ke sebuah dunia fantasi, protagonis dunia itu yang dengan beruntungnya terpilih, bersumpah untuk melakukan balas dendam terhadapnya. Semua orang sangat iri pada Protagonis itu, karena bukan hanya karakter utama wanita tergila-gila padanya, tapi dia juga selalu diperlakukan sebagai tamu kehormatan kemanapun dia pergi. Untungnya, martabat dan kekuatan Gu Changge jauh melebihi milik orang lain, sehingga dia tidak dengan mudah jatuh di tangan orang yang hanya terpilih karena keberuntungannya?

 

Tunggu dulu… ada sistem yang didedikasikan untuk meraup dan mengambil dari apa yang dimiliki protagonis? Gu Changge tersenyum. “Sepertinya takdir pun ingin aku memenuhi takdirku sebagai orang jahat di dunia ini!”
description.pl: Gu Changge zostaje przeniesiony do świata wuxia, gdzie z miejsca staje się obiektem nienawiści protagonisty, będącego Wybrańcem Losu, gdyż nie dość, że główna bohaterka rzuca mu się w ramiona, to jeszcze jest przez wszystkich traktowany niczym znamienity gość. Na szczęście jego postać cechuje znacząca siła, więc powinien bez trudu zmiażdżyć jakiegoś w czepku urodzonego dzieciaka, prawda? “Chwila… Otrzymałem wyspecjalizowany system, który pozwala mi okradać głównego bohatera ze szczęścia?” Gu Changge uśmiechnął się znacząco. “Zdaje się, że moim przeznaczeniem jest podążanie ścieżką prowadzącą do stania się największym czarnym charakterem w tym świecie!”
description.ru:
Гу Чангэ попадает в фэнтези-мир, где, по-классике, оказывается в шкуре главного козла отпущения.
Удивительно, что главный герой сразу же снизыскал расположение у императрицы, чем вызвал бурю ненависти в свой адрес. К счастью, Чангэ - уважаемый человек в городе и единственное, что его спасает от кары в данной ситуации это высокий статус в обществе. Подождите-ка... а вы уже знаете, что здесь есть необычная система рангов, в которой присутствуют яркие герои всех мастей? Проанализировав события, герой понимает, что выгоднее всего вжиться в свою новую роль и пойти по пути персонажа-злодея!
description.pt-br: Imediatamente após Gu Changge perceber que havia transmigrado para um mundo de fantasia, o protagonista do mundo, e o escolhido da fortuna, jurou se vingar dele. Invejado por todos, ele não só tem a liderança feminina de ponta-cabeça por ele, mas também é tratado como um distinto convidado onde quer que vá. Felizmente, o prestígio e o poder de Gu Changge são superiores aos de todos os outros, então não deveria ser fácil pisar em uma mera escolha da fortuna? Espere … Existe um sistema dedicado à ordenha e colheita do protagonista? Gu Changge sorriu. “Parece que até o destino quer que eu cumpra meu destino como o vilão deste mundo!”

title.en: Uragirareta Boukensha, Andeddo Toshite Yomigaeri Musou Suru

altTitles.ja: アンデッド・キング 〜底辺冒険者、魔物の力で進化無双〜

altTitles.en: Undead King ~A Low-Ranking Adventurer, With the Power of Monsters, Becomes Unbeatable~

altTitles.ja: 裏切られた冒険者、アンデッドとして蘇り無双する

description.en:
(skills). A power humans can only receive once from god, which is used to fight against monsters.
Chrome, who aspired to be an adventurer while owning a skill that is useless in combat, is unable to throw away his ambition, and is despised for his inability, so he is left in charge of menial tasks and chores for his career.
But, when he is running away from a monster as a decoy, he loses his life. But at that time, his skill activates. The skill (Revival). For one time only, he can come back from the dead, and Chrome miraculously revives as a Skeleton monster, a “Wight”.
Chrome, who despairs at his new body, finds out that as monsters evolve, their appearance changes in accordance, so he decides to evolve as fast as possible. Believing he can regain his human appearance, Chrome spends his days hunting monsters. As a by-product, Chrome gains a multitude of skills, whereas a human can only ever hold one––!
Powerful monster abilities and the intelligence of a human. Overcoming adversity with chance, Chrome once again aims to be the strongest adventurer!

altTitles.en: Dangerous Lovers

description.en:
I've long known about your ill intentions!

Huang Yun'er, a D-lister deliberately gets close to female CEO Ou Chenxi, intending to seduce her in order to gain access to the Ou family and investigate her cousin's death. Ou Chenxi sees through Huang Yun'er's scheming, but believing she can fully control the situation and finding Huang Yun'er aesthetically appealing, she doesn't reject this dangerous woman's advances. At the same time, she wants to investigate Huang Yun'er's motives.

One deliberately seduces but wavers due to love amidst her calculations, while the other is irresistibly attracted despite knowing the danger... These two cunning individuals sink together while fully aware, parrying each other's moves while desperately trying to suppress their growing feelings. As they struggle with their emotions, they gradually uncover secrets from the past.

altTitles.en: You are a Four Leaf Clover

altTitles.ja: きみは四葉のクローバー

description.en: Uichi was once popular, but now he is being bullied excessively. Then suddenly, his first love, Yotsuha, appears in front of him. What is this cute and brave girl's purpose...?
description.ja: かつての人気者で、今は過激ないじめを受ける宇一。そんな彼の前に突然現れた初恋の相手・よつは。可愛く健気な彼女の目的とは一体…!?
description.vi: Câu chuyện romcom nhẹ nhàng về hành trình chữa lành trái tim đã tan vỡ của main
description.zh: 某天，曾很有人气的宇一的生活陡然一变。 以往光芒四射的日子被用抹布也无法擦去的黑暗所笼罩。 这时，熟悉宇一过去的初恋—— 四叶突然出现在了他的面前。 她的目的究竟是…！？

title.en: Tensei-saki wa Akuyaku Reijou no Chichioya deshita ~Kawaii Musume no Shibou Flag wa Zenbu Orimasu~

altTitles.ja: 転生先は悪役令嬢の父親でした～可愛い娘の死亡フラグは全部折ります～

altTitles.ja-ro: Tensei-saki ha Akuyaku Reijou no Chichioya deshita ~Kawaii Musume no Shibou Flag ha Zenbu Orimasu~

altTitles.en: I Was Just Reincarnated As The Villainess's Father ~I'll Snap All Of My Cute Daughter's Death Flags~

description.en: Ryuichi, a 44-year-old single father, gets into a traffic accident while protecting his high school daughter Mizuho, ​​who ran away from home after an argument. After losing consciousness and accepting his death, he finds himself in the body of a young man he had never seen before. While panicking, he finds a girl who looks exactly like Mizuho when she was a child, and as he sorts out the situation, it seems that he has been reincarnated as the father of the game's villainess…!?
description.ja: 44歳のシングルファザーの龍一（りゅういち）は口論の末、家を飛び出した女子高生の娘・瑞穂（みずほ）をかばい、交通事故に遭ってしまう。意識が遠のき死を覚悟した後に目覚めると、見知らぬ若い男性の姿になっていた。動揺する中、小さい頃の瑞穂そっくりな少女がいて、状況を整理していくと、どうやらゲームの悪役令嬢の父親に転生してしまったようで……!?

title.en: Harapeko Kopeko wa Niku to Sumu!

altTitles.ja: 腹ぺここぺ子はニクと棲む！

altTitles.en: Starving Kopeko Lives with Her Meat!
Love is an illusion ~Superstar~

description.en:
Byul, a popular alpha and a first-year high school student, once trained to be an idol but has since left that path to attend school like a regular kid. His world takes an unexpected turn with the sudden birth of a younger sibling, introducing new challenges to his daily routine. Byul's childhood friend, Siwoo, has secretly harbored feelings for him for years. However, both being alphas, Siwoo has kept his emotions hidden.

As the two navigate their growing closeness after a period of time apart, Byul faces adolescence head-on, grappling with friendships, family relationships, and his sense of identity. Along the way, he rediscovers his passion for music and begins to mature through these transformative experiences.
description.pl:
"Byul, popularny alfa i uczeń pierwszej klasy liceum, kiedyś trenował, aby zostać idolem, ale od tego czasu porzucił tę ścieżkę, aby uczęszczać do szkoły jak zwykłe dziecko. Jego świat przybiera nieoczekiwany obrót wraz z nagłymi narodzinami młodszego rodzeństwa, wprowadzając nowe wyzwania do jego codziennej rutyny. Przyjaciel Byula z dzieciństwa, Siwoo, od lat skrycie żywi do niego uczucia. Jednak Siwoo, będąc alfą, ukrywał swoje emocje.

Podczas gdy obaj radzą sobie z rosnącą bliskością po okresie rozłąki, Byul staje twarzą w twarz z dorastaniem, zmagając się z przyjaźniami, relacjami rodzinnymi i poczuciem tożsamości. Po drodze na nowo odkrywa swoją pasję do muzyki i zaczyna dojrzewać dzięki tym transformującym doświadczeniom".

altTitles.ja: ドラマクイン

description.en: After saving the earth, aliens have taken up residence with the humans in Japan. Nomamoto, a factory worker with an abusive alien boss, one day meets Kitami, who tells her his own family was killed by aliens. The two quickly forge a friendship, but one day Kitami does the unthinkable...

altTitles.ja: サムライ ディーパー キョウ

description.en:
At the dawn of the 17th century, at the end of the era of civil wars, in a world of chaos, the epic Battle of Sekigahara was joined. One man emerged from the largest battle ever fought on Japanese soil; a terrible warrior of unspeakable power, he was nicknamed 'the unconquerable.'  
  
Kyoshiro is a peaceful medicine peddler who harbors the soul of an assassin. He accompanies a young bounty hunter across Japan in search of a murderer and on a quest to discover the terrible secret of his own identity.
description.vi: Vào khoảng đầu thế kỉ 17, Trận chiến Sekigahara đã nổ ra, đặt dấu chấm hết cho những cuộc chính biến hỗn loạn trong lòng NB. Sekigahara......Không ai có thể quên được ánh gươm trên chiến trường đẫm máu và đôi mắt đỏ rừng rực cháy. Một Samurai nguy hiểm? Một sức mạnh kinh hoàng? Con người đó.....bất khả chiến bại.....

altTitles.ja: MFゴースト

description.en: In the year 202X, when self-driving electric and fuel-cell vehicles are ubiquitous, the racing organization MFG exists. Hosting races in Japan exclusively using cars with internal combustion engine. We follow young half-British, half-Japanese racing driver, Kanata Rivington. Who graduated at the top of his class in racing school and was invited into the series thanks to his teacher's connections.

title.en: I Took Over The System Players

description.en: College student, Xing Ye gained the ability to take over another person’s body with a success rate of 100%, but by chance took over the body of a necromancer. This necromancer turns out to be the owner of the system, and it’s all because of this system that he’s a corpse after dying. This system gives suicide missions with no regards of the host’s abilities, but Xing Ye finds this suicide system quite compatible with him now that he’s a corpse? “Hahaha, I’m already dead, what do I have to fear?”
description.zh: 大学生星夜死后获得百分百夺舍能力，却意外夺舍炼尸，而这炼尸生前竟然是系统持有者，之所以死亡变成炼尸都是被他的系统害得，这系统会不顾宿主等级的派发作死任务，但星夜发现身为炼尸的自己和这作死系统竟意外的有配合？哈哈哈，老子已经死了还怕什么作死

altTitles.ja: レナタ タッテ 貸与れる女神

description.en: Renata, a once almighty goddess, has returned in the modern day and must do odd jobs to earn offerings in order to restore her powers and save the world from an incoming monster uprising.

title.en: Mitame Jirai-kei Osananajimi no Ren'ai Story

altTitles.ja: 見た目地雷系幼馴染の恋愛ストーリー

altTitles.ja-ro: Mitame Jirai-kei Osananajimi no Renai Story

altTitles.en: A Love Story About a Childhood Friend Who Looks Like a Landmine Girl
A Landmine-Type-Appearing Childhood Friend's Love Story
My Childhood Friend Who Looks Like a Landmine Type

altTitles.pt-br: Uma história de amor sobre uma amiga de infância que parece um campo minado

altTitles.uk: Історія кохання з подругою дитинства, яка прив'язалася до мене

altTitles.id: Kisah Cinta Teman Masa Kecil yang Terlihat Berbahaya

description.en:
This is my love story with a landmine girl who's convinced that I'm her childhood friend.
___
**Alt Official Raw:** [X](https://x.com/onnoveltet/status/1829430063294738758)
description.ja: 自分のことを幼馴染だと思い込んでいる地雷系女子との恋愛物語です。
description.pt-br: Esta é a minha história de amor com uma garota convencida de que sou seu amigo de infância.

altTitles.ja: アップデーター～NPCからの成り上がり～

description.en:
The blacksmith NPC ‘Aiden.’

One day, his village gets deleted by the hands of the system moderator and as he and his little sister ‘Elise’ perished, he swore to himself.

I’ll destroy this system with my very hands.

It was then…!

“You have unlocked moderator perms, Moderator Lv. 1”

Aiden wakes up with a new power,

Marking the beginning of his journey as a moderator…!

What will become of Aiden?!

---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/69621)
description.ja:
鍛冶屋のＮPCエイダン。ある日、システム管理者によって村と唯一の家族である妹アリスを消され、自分も消される最中、「こんなシステム、俺がぶっ壊してやる！」そう誓った瞬間、何者かの手によって生き延び管理者権限まで付与された！ 果たして彼は何者になってしまうのか…！！

---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/69621)
description.ko:
대장장이 NPC '에이든＇.
어느 날, 시스템 관리자로 인해 마을 전체가 삭제당하고,
유일한 가족인 여동생 ‘앨리스’와 함께 소멸하던 그는
그 찰나의 순간, 다짐했다.

반드시 내 손으로 이 시스템을 무너뜨리겠노라고.
그때였다…!

“관리자 권한을 획득했습니다. 관리자 Lv. 1”

관리자의 권한을 가지고 다시 깨어난 에이든.
관리자로서의 힘을 기르기 시작하는데...!!

에이든은 과연 어떤 존재가 될 것인가?!

2020년 “콘티왕으로 살아남기” 대상 수상작 <업데이터>

---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/69621)
description.ru:
Родная деревня главного героя, кузнеца-нпс Эйдена, была подвергнута зачистке модератором системы. В ходе сего бедствия младшая сестра эйдена, эллис, погибает, что становится для него переключателем между мирной жизнью и жизнью, полной жажды во что бы то ни стало уничтожить систему, отобравшую у эйдена его единственную родственницу.
Неожиданно для себя он обретает полномочия модератора и продолжает становиться сильнее, чтобы осуществить задуманное. До какого же уровня сумеет дойти наш герой в погоне за своей целью?

---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/69621)
description.pt-br:
O ferreiro NPC "Aiden".

Um dia, sua vila foi deletada pelas mãos do moderador do sistema e ele e sua irmã, “Alice”, pereceram.

Ele jurou para si mesmo: Irei destruir o sistema com minhas próprias mãos.

Foi então que…!
Você desbloqueou permissão de moderador, Moderador Nvl. 1”

Aiden despertou com um novo poder, Marcando o início de sua jornada como um moderador…!

O que será do destino dele?!

title.en: Shane x Onna Oujoushu no Manga

altTitles.ja: シェーン×女農場主の漫画

altTitles.ja-ro: Shane x Onna Oujoushu no Manga

altTitles.en: A Manga about Shane and the Farmer
Shane x Female Farmer

description.en:
A Stardew Valley doujin that follows the love story of Shane and Mugi, a farmer who has just moved to Pelican Town. 
The story is semi-original and does not strictly follow the game's events and dialogue.

altTitles.ja: ブルーブラッドヴァンパイア

description.en: Azure, the founding father of vampires who has lived since time immemorial, is challenged to a fight by Shuuya, a vampire hunter who makes no effort to conceal his hostility. Interest piqued, Azure proposes a game. Should Shuuya come to love Azure by the time the red spider lilies wither, he shall become a bride. Should Shuuya’s feelings remain unchanged, his wish shall be granted. What will become of Shuuya, fiancé to the strongest vampire...!?

title.en: A Mother's Love, a Daughter's Prison

altTitles.ja: 母という呪縛 娘という牢獄

altTitles.vi: Lời nguyền của mẹ - Ngục tù của con

altTitles.ja-ro: Haha to iu Jubaku Musume to iu Rougoku

description.en: The torso of a headless, limbless body is found half-buried by a riverbank. It belonged to middle-aged mother Yaeko Miyagawa, and after an investigation and trial, her daughter Hikari eventually confesses to her murder. For many years, Hikari had been subjected to physical and emotional abuse by her mother, revolving around her failure to make it into a top medical school and become a doctor. Even after nine years of futile applications and entrance exams, Yaeko refused to free her daughter from this virtual prison. What led to the fatal stabbing that ended Yaeko’s life? This series, based on a true story, will explore Hikari Miyagawa’s experiences up to her greatest tragedy—and what happened to her afterward.
description.vi:
Đây là một câu chuyện dựa trên sự việc có thật.
Một th... th... với đầu và tứ chi bị ch.t đ.ứ.t l.ì.a được phát hiện thấy bên bờ sông. Sau khi điều tra, cảnh sát đã xác minh danh tính nạn nhân là Miyagawa Yaeko, thế nhưng rúng động hơn, hung thủ gây ra vụ án dã man này không ai khác chính là Miyagawa Hikari, con gái của bị hại.
Được biết suốt thời gian qua, Miyagawa Hikari đã liên tục bị mẹ ép học hành quá mức, và đã thi trượt vào Đại học Y đến 9 lần. Thế nhưng, mẹ cô lại không hề có ý định dừng lại. Và rồi, chuyện gì đến cũng sẽ phải đến...

altTitles.ja: 青のオーケストラ

description.en:
Aono Hajime was a prodigy violinist until he grew jaded with playing the violin due to personal reasons. 
Now in his third year of middle school, he struggles to decide his academic path. 
One day in school, he meets Akine Ritsuko, a hotheaded novice violinist who wants to enroll in a high school with a distinguished orchestra club. 
When he finds himself getting closer to Ritsuko and being brought back to the world of violinists, time starts moving again for him.  
  
This is the beginning of a youthful drama where sounds and hearts alike resound in harmony.

---
- **Won the 68th Shogakukan Manga Award for Shonen in 2023, which it shared alongside Call of the Night**
description.tr: Aono Hajime, kişisel nedenlerden dolayı keman çalmayı bırakana kadar harika bir kemancıydı. Şimdi ortaokulun üçüncü yılında akademik yoluna karar vermek için mücadele ediyor. Bir gün okulda, seçkin bir orkestra kulübü olan bir liseye kaydolmak isteyen agresif, acemi bir kemancı olan Akine Ritsuko ile tanışır. Kendisini Ritsuko'ya yaklaşırken ve kemancıların dünyasına geri getirilirken bulan Aono için zaman tekrar hareket etmeye başlar. Bu, seslerin ve kalplerin benzer şekilde uyum içinde olduğu genç bir dramanın başlangıcıdır.

altTitles.ja: JESUS 砂塵航路

altTitles.en: Jesus: Path of the Sandstorm

description.en:
Continuation of the manga "Jesus". The legendary killer, hiding under the guise of school teacher Fujisawa Shingo, returns to Japan after more than ten years! What made him come back? What has he been doing for these ten years? Is one of his new students connected to 24?
Read on and find out in JESUS: Path of the Sandstorm!

altTitles.ja: ろくでなしBLUES

description.en:
Maeda is a new student in the Teiken High School. He stutters when he's nervous and he's rather clumsy. He gets noted immediately because he hits a teacher during the entrance ceremony. Some clubs search to enlist him as they see in him a force they can use to get even with other clubs. But Maeda is a loner and has only one dream: becoming boxing champion. His first objective is to beat the leader of the boxing club. "Rokudenashi" translates as "good for nothing".  
  
The manga focuses more on gang warfare than boxing.
description.es:
Maeda es un estudiante nuevo en el instituto Teiken. Tartamudea cuando está nervioso y es bastante torpe. Se hace notar inmediatamente porque golpea a un profesor durante la ceremonia de ingreso. Algunos clubes buscan alistarlo ya que ven en él una fuerza que pueden utilizar para vengarse de otros clubes. Pero Maeda es un solitario y sólo tiene un sueño: convertirse en campeón de boxeo. Su primer objetivo es vencer al líder del club de boxeo. "Rokudenashi" se traduce como "bueno para nada".

El manga se centra más en la lucha entre pandillas que en el boxeo.
description.vi:
Maeda Taison, chàng thiếu niên tới từ Osaka mang trong mình ước mơ trở thành nhà vô địch boxing thế giới. Xuyên suốt 3 năm học của cậu không chỉ là những trận đánh, những xung đột mà còn có cả những câu chuyện đầy tính nhân văn.
Huyền thoại của dòng manga yankee Nhật Bản, dù đã kết thúc từ năm 1997 nhưng Rokudenashi Blues (RB) vẫn đang là bộ manga yankee bán chạy nhất mọi thời đại. Vì kết thúc đã lâu nên nội dung của nó có phần "outdate", tuy nhiên vẫn rất đáng đọc.
description.es-la:
Maeda es un estudiante nuevo en el instituto Teiken. Tartamudea cuando está nervioso y es bastante torpe. Se hace notar inmediatamente porque golpea a un profesor durante la ceremonia de ingreso. Algunos clubes buscan alistarlo ya que ven en él una fuerza que pueden utilizar para vengarse de otros clubes. Pero Maeda es un solitario y sólo tiene un sueño: convertirse en campeón de boxeo. Su primer objetivo es vencer al líder del club de boxeo. "Rokudenashi" se traduce como "bueno para nada".

El manga se centra más en la lucha entre pandillas que en el boxeo.

title.en: Dame Skill [Auto Mode] ga Kakuseishimashita ~Are, Guild no Scout-san, Ore wo "Iranai"-tte Itte Masendeshita?~

altTitles.ja: ダメスキル【自動機能】が覚醒しました～あれ、ギルドのスカウトの皆さん、俺を「いらない」って言ってませんでした？～

altTitles.en: The Useless Skill [Auto Mode] Has Been Awakened: Huh, Guild's Scout, Didn't You Say I Wasn't Needed Anymore?

altTitles.ja-ro: Dame Skill [Jidou Kinou] ga Kakuseishimashita ~Are, Guild no Scout-san, Ore wo "Iranai"-tte Itte Masendeshita?~

description.en:
Young boy Claus was gifted with a Skill called [Auto Mode]. It is an extremely rare skill and he was so pleased when first received it...

Turns out, the skill's abilities [Auto Return] for "only to go home" and [Auto Travel] for "only to go to places that have been visited" are a completely useless ability for both combat and making money!

However, the now leveled up Claus has come to know the true nature of [Auto Mode]!

---

(JP) [Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n2757gs/) [Light Novel](https://kc.kodansha.co.jp/title?code=1000040012)
description.ja: １５歳の少年クラウスが教会で授かったのは発現自体が珍しいというユニークスキル！　将来は勇者か英雄かと胸を高鳴らせた少年だがその夢は無残にも打ち砕かれる…。スキル【自動機能】は[自動で家に帰れるだけ]のてんで役立たずな外れスキルだったからだ！　スキルレベルが上がればと期待を抱くが、レベル2は[自動で行ったことのある場所へ移動するだけ]、レベル３は[自動で資源を採取するだけ]とがっかりする。ところが念のためクラウスが試してみると…！？

altTitles.ja: 八男って、それはないでしょう!

altTitles.en: The 8th Son? Are You Kidding Me?

altTitles.pt-br: O 8º Filho? Você Está Brincando Comigo?

altTitles.es-la: ¿El octavo hijo? ¡Eso no puede ser cierto!

altTitles.ru: Восьмой сын? Да не может этого быть!

altTitles.bg: хатинан ттэ, сорэ ва най дэсё:

altTitles.th: ผมเนี่ยนะ...ชายแปด!

altTitles.vi: Con Trai Thứ 8, Đừng Đùa Nữa!

description.en:
Ichinomiya Shingo, a young 25 years old, single, company worker, while thinking of tomorrow’s busy working day goes to sleep. However, the when he wakes up, it was a room unknown to him.

He learns that he is inside a 6 years-old boy and has taken over his mind. Furthermore, he learns a lot from the memories of said boy: he was born as the youngest child (8th son and 10th child) of a poor noble family living in the back country. Having no administrative skill, he couldn’t do anything to manage the vast land his family has. Fortunately, he was blessed with a very rare talent, talent of magic. Unfortunately, while his talent could bring prosperity to his family, in his situation it only brought disaster.

Yes, this is the story of the boy, Wendelin von Benno Baumeister, opening his own path in a harsh world.
description.pt-br: Ichinomiya Shingo, um jovem de 25 anos de idade, solteiro, funcionário de uma empresa, enquanto pensa sobre o agitado dia de trabalho de amanhã vai dormir. No entanto, no momento em que ele acordou, era um quarto desconhecido para ele. Ele então descobriu que estava dentro de um menino de 6 anos de idade e tinha assumido sua mente. Além disso, ele aprendeu muito com as lembranças do menino: ele nasceu como o filho mais novo (oitavo filho de 10 crianças) de uma pobre família nobre que vive no interior do país. Não tendo nenhuma habilidade, ele não podia fazer nada para administrar a vasta terra que sua família possui. Felizmente, ele foi abençoado com um talento muito raro, o talento da magia. Infelizmente, enquanto seu talento poderia trazer prosperidade a sua família, em sua situação, só trouxe desastre. Esta é a história do garoto, Wendelin von Bennon Baumeister, abrindo seu próprio caminho em um mundo cruel.

title.en: Hazure Skill "Kage ga Usui" o Motsu Guild Shokuin ga, Jitsuwa Densetsu no Ansatsusha

altTitles.en: Hazure Skill: The Guild Member with a Worthless Skill Is Actually a Legendary Assassin
The Guild Official With the Out-of-the-Way Skill "Shadowy" Is, in Fact, the Legendary Assassin
The Guild Official With Weak Skill "Vanish" Is Actually Legendary Assassin

altTitles.ru: В итоге офицер гильдии оказался легендарным убийцей

altTitles.ja: 外れスキル「影が薄い」を持つギルド職員が、実は伝説の暗殺者

altTitles.zh: 拥有开挂技能「薄影」的公会职员原来是传说级别的暗杀者

description.en:
Roland is an assassin who, one day, breaks from his team and single-handedly "kills" the demon king.

After returning to the kingdom, the king graciously promises Roland whatever he wants for his heroics. Conflicted in his desires - he hasn’t thought of anything outside of killing for years - he remembers that one of his teammates told him what she plans to do after evil is defeated: Live an ordinary life.

And so Roland, with his ability to become unnoticeable and the disguised demon king/queen Laila at his side, decides to live a - say it with me - slow life.
description.pt-br: Roland é um assassino que, um dia, rompe com sua equipe e, sozinho, "mata" o rei demônio (que na verdade é uma garota porque você deveria ter descoberto o tipo de história que é agora). Depois de retornar ao reino, o rei graciosamente promete a Roland o que ele quiser para seu heroísmo. Conflito em seus desejos - ele não pensa em nada além de matar por anos - ele lembra que um de seus companheiros de equipe disse a ele o que ela planeja fazer depois que o mal for derrotado: Viver uma vida comum.

title.en: Ao no Hana, Utsuwa no Mori

altTitles.ja: 青の花 器の森

altTitles.ja-ro: Ao no Hana, Utsuwa no Mori

altTitles.en: The Blue Flowers, and the Ceramic Forest

altTitles.th: แต่งเติมลวดลายในรัก

description.en:
Aoko is a ceramic painter at Hasami Wares Pottery, when suddenly an unfriendly and unapproachable man named Tatsuki arrives from overseas. Rejecting her way of life by telling her he isn't interested in painted ceramics, Aoko feels dejected, but can't help but be drawn to Tatsuki's ceramics…  
  
This is a mature love story of a man and woman, both fascinated by ceramics.
description.zh: 青之花 器之森漫画 ，小玉ユキ为大人献上的爱情故事， 陶瓷器与充满坡道的小镇、波佐见—— 对「器」怀着热爱的男女、 在这个小镇相遇…！？

altTitles.ja: マーメイドメロディー　『ぴちぴちピッチ　ａｑｕａ』

altTitles.en: Mermaid Melody—Pichi Pichi Pitch: Aqua

altTitles.ja: ぴちぴちピッチ　ａｑｕａ

description.en: Lukia Nanami is turning seventeen. Her family has just moved to a town by the sea, and on her first walk down to the beach, she saves a handsome surfer from drowning. The next day, she’s shocked to discover he’s not only a classmate at her new school, but has no idea who she is, and insists he was saved by a mermaid! A new chapter in the saga of *Mermaid Melody Pichi Pichi Pitch*, from original artist Pink Hanamori! [Kodansha]

altTitles.en: Fabulous Beasts
There Are Beasts

description.en:
"In this realm mythological creatures roam, descendant of the nine heavens they call home." 

Sibuxiang, a mythical deer-man couch potato, is kicked out of heaven and assigned to support the mythological creatures wandering the human world. He meets and goes on adventures with his friends: the energetic, food loving Pixiu named Pipi, the fanatic moon bunny Tuye, the banished-from-heaven mouse brothers Jinjiao and Yinjiao, and many others. What kind of adventures will they take on?
description.zh:
《人间有神兽，来自九重天 》

随着科技的发展，往日威风凛凛的神兽们日子大不如前。神兽四不像奉命下凡，去解救流落人间的落魄神兽。在凡间，他遇到了走投无路的老同事天禄，不得志的酒友兔爷，被贬下凡的金银角兄弟……从此开启了一段新的旅程。

altTitles.ja: 第3のギデオン

description.en: The stage is the eve of the French Revolution. There is the commoner Gideon, who wants to save the impoverished country side-by-side with the members of the Estates General. Then there is the aristocrat, Georges, who will use any means to achieve his purpose. A man who wants to change the country, and a man who wants to destroy it. Both begin their journey forward. Will their joint efforts of love and hatred, justice and evil lead them to a hell of bloodshed, or an ideal future?

altTitles.ja: ワンピース

description.en:
Gol D. Roger, a man referred to as the "Pirate King," is set to be executed by the World Government. But just before his demise, he confirms the existence of a great treasure, One Piece, located somewhere within the vast ocean known as the Grand Line. Announcing that One Piece can be claimed by anyone worthy enough to reach it, the Pirate King is executed and the Great Age of Pirates begins.  
  
Twenty-two years later, a young man by the name of Monkey D. Luffy is ready to embark on his own adventure, searching for One Piece and striving to become the new Pirate King. Armed with just a straw hat, a small boat, and an elastic body, he sets out on a fantastic journey to gather his own crew and a worthy ship that will take them across the Grand Line to claim the greatest status on the high seas.

---

**Note:**  
**Because a takedown notice was sent to MangaDex from the owners of this series, English fan translations of One Piece are unable to be posted at this time. The series can be read in its entirety at [the official Shonen Jump website,](https://www.viz.com/shonenjump/chapters/one-piece) with the first and latest three chapters available at any time and the rest accessible with a Shonen Jump membership (which costs about $2 a month and can be accessed via a VPN if you are outside the US). The three most recent chapters can also be read on MangaPlus for free by clicking the chapter links below.**

---
- **The Best-Selling Manga in History**
- **Won the 41st Japan Cartoonists Association Award Grand Prize alongside Neko Darake in 2012** 
- **Received the Kumamoto Prefecture Honorary Prize in 2018**
description.es: Hace veintidós años, el legendario pirata, Gold D. Roger fue ejecutado. Sus últimas palabras fueron que su tesoro conocido como "One Piece" estaba escondido en algún lugar dentro del vasto océano conocido como Grand Line. Esto dio inicio a la Era de los Piratas. Ahora, Monkey D. Luffy, un joven que, inspirado por su ídolo de la infancia emprende su viaje buscando el One Piece y convertirse en el Rey de los Piratas.
description.ru: Последние слова, произнесённые Королем Пиратов Гол Д. Роджером перед казнью, вдохновили многих выйти в море: «Мои сокровища? Я завещаю их тому, кто сможет их найти. Ищите! Я все оставил в одном месте!». Лишённые сна и покоя люди ринулись на Гранд Лайн, самое опасное место в мире. Так началась великая эра пиратов… Но с каждым годом романтиков становилось все меньше, их постепенно вытесняли прагматичные пираты-разбойники, которым награбленное добро было куда ближе, чем какие-то «никчёмные мечты». Но вот, одним прекрасным днем, семнадцатилетний Монки Д. Луффи исполнил заветную мечту детства - отправился в море. Его цель — ни много, ни мало стать новым Королём Пиратов. За достаточно короткий срок юному капитану удаётся собрать команду, состоящую из не менее амбициозных искателей приключений. И пусть ими движут совершенно разные устремления, главное, этим ребятам важны не столько деньги и слава, сколько куда более ценное – принципы и верность друзьям. И ещё – служение Мечте. Что же, пока по Гранд Лайн плавают такие люди, Великая Эра Пиратов всегда будет с нами!
description.uk:
Король піратів Ґолд Роджер буде страчений Світовим урядом. Прямо перед смертю він підтвердив існування великого скарбу «Ван Піс», який знаходиться десь на величезному морі Ґранд Лайн. Як тільки Роджер сказав, що будь-хто гідний досягти Ван Пісу може забрати його собі, його стратили, і почалася Велика ера піратів.

Двадцять два роки потому, молодий хлопець на ім’я Монкі Д. Луффі готовий почати свою пригоду по пошуку Ван Пісу та здобуванню титулу Короля піратів. Маючи при собі солом’яну шапку, невеличкий човен та еластичне тіло, він вирушає у неймовірну подорож, щоб зібрати собі команду та хороший корабель, який зможе пронести їх через весь Ґранд Лайн, щоб стати найвеличнішими в усіх морях.
description.es-la: Hace veintidós años, el legendario pirata, Gold D. Roger fue ejecutado. Sus últimas palabras fueron que su tesoro conocido como "One Piece" estaba escondido en algún lugar dentro del vasto océano conocido como Grand Line. Esto dio inicio a la Era de los Piratas. Ahora, Monkey D. Luffy, un joven que, inspirado por su ídolo de la infancia emprende su viaje buscando el One Piece y convertirse en el Rey de los Piratas.
description.pt-br: One Piece começa quando Gol D. Roger, o Rei Dos Piratas que possuiu tudo nesse mundo, antes de ser executado, diz que escondeu o seu tesouro em algum lugar da Grand Line, um oceano extremamente perigoso. Desde então muitos piratas se aventuram pela Grand Line para tentar encontrar o tesouro chamado One Piece. Um deles é Monkey D. Luffy, o garoto que, acidentalmente, comeu uma das Akuma No Mi, a Gomu Gomu No Mi (Fruta da Borracha), e agora ele pode esticar seu corpo como se fosse uma borracha. A jornada dele começa atrás de companheiros e um barco, que ele vai conseguindo pouco a pouco, pois tem um objetivo: Ser o Rei Dos Piratas!!

description.en: After leaving a scar on his best friend's face years ago, Tsubaki feels responsible and is determined to grow up big and strong so he can protect Yuu. Yuu is already in high school and Tsubaki is only in elementary, but he is sure that his feelings will get through and Yuu will eventually come to rely on him.

altTitles.zh-ro: Sanguozhi Qunxiongzhuan: Huo Feng Liao Yuan

altTitles.zh-hk: 三国志群雄伝火鳳燎原

altTitles.ja: 火鳳燎原

altTitles.de: The Ravages of Time: Die Geschichte der Drei Reiche

description.en:
Nearly 2000 years ago, the prosperous Han dynasty of China collapsed. Heroes rose and fell, and three nations emerged–Wei, Shu, and Wu. Historians refer to this period as the Three Kingdoms period. The romance of the three kingdoms is an intriguing tale of heroic deeds, of alliance forged and broken, of loyalty and betrayal.  
  
Hong Kong artist Chan Mou retells this classic tale in "The Ravages of Time" from the perspective of the Sima clan, which in the end united the three kingdoms. Readers will be attracted by an array of well-developed characters and Chan Mou's own unique top-notch art-style. Whether you have played Dynasty Warriors or not, this is definitely worth a read!
description.vi:
Truyện kể về thời kỳ Tam quốc tranh bá nổi tiếng trong lịch sử Trung Quốc. Điểm đặc biệt ở đây là nhân vật trung tâm của truyện không phải là Tào Tháo, Lưu Bị hay Tôn Quyền như ta thường thấy ở các bộ truyện nói về thời kì này mà là Tư Mã Ý - người mà sau này đã cùng với gia tộc mình đánh bại tất cả các anh hùng khác, gom thiên hạ về thành 1 mối, chấm dứt 1 thời kỳ dài loạn lạc. 

Truyện mở đầu bằng cơn ác mộng mà Tư Mã Ý vẫn thường gặp: 1 người đàn ông trên ngai vàng phế truất ngôi vị của hoàng đế, bên ngoài bất chấp đám đông binh lính bao vây tấn công cùng bao nhiêu thương tích mà 1 người bình thường không thể chịu đựng nổi, tên tù vượt ngục vẫn bước từng bước từng bước một vào điện đòi món nợ máu với người đàn ông đó. Đó chỉ là cơn ác mộng hay là 1 điềm báo? Không ai nói được kể cả Tư Mã Ý.

Nhưng cũng có ai có thời gian để quan tâm đến truyện ấy trong thời loạn lạc này chứ. Dù cố né tránh, cuối cùng dòng họ Tư Mã cũng phải bước vào vòng xoáy chiến tranh, và sự xuất hiện của họ đã làm thay đổi cả dòng lịch sử....

altTitles.en: The Galactic Navy Officer Becomes an Adventurer

altTitles.ja: 航宙軍士官、冒険者になる

altTitles.pt-br: Capitão Corinth: Um Oficial da Marinha Galáctica Torna-se um Aventureiro

altTitles.en: Captain Corinth: The Galactic Navy Officer Becomes an Adventurer

description.en:
In order to protect the planet Ares from invasion by the Bugs, Alan Corinth has set his sights on nothing less than ruling the entire continent. The Kingdom of Belta, which borders the Great Demon Forest, is the ideal spot to start putting his plan in motion, so he and his party set off for the gathering place of the finest adventurers the kingdom has to offer: the citadel of Gantz.

Will Alan be able to keep the hostile aliens from overrunning this fantasy planet?  The sci-fi medieval fantasy story begins!
description.pt-br:
A nave espacial que o oficial da Marinha Imperial Galáctica que Alan Corinth estava foi derrubada por um ataque surpresa durante a navegação no hiperespaço.

Completamente a deriva, e sobre uma estranha coincidência, Alan se tornou o único na nave a sobreviver. A nave espacial severamente danificada perdeu suas capacidades de navegação e despencou em um planeta próximo.

Usando uma cápsula de fuga, Alan dirigiu-se ao planeta sozinho.

Assim começou a busca de Alan pela sobrevivência no planeta subdesenvolvido utilizando as nanomáquinas simbiótica dentro de seu corpo.

Surpreendentemente, o planeta era o lar de uma próspera civilização humana cujo código genético se assemelhava ao de Alan.

Mesmo permanecendo perdido devido a ser jogado em um mundo de espadas e magia, ele tenta viver o melhor que pode junto com seus novos companheiros.

O que Alan conseguiria nesse mundo estranho?

A história de fantasia de ficção científica em um cenário medieval agora começa!

altTitles.lt: AÅ¡ voras, ir kas iÅ¡ to?

Да, я паук, и что с того?

altTitles.pt-br: Então eu sou uma aranha, e daí?

altTitles.en: So I'm a Spider, So What?

description.en:
When a mysterious explosion killed an entire class full of high school students, the souls of everyone in class were transported into a fantasy world and reincarnated. While some students were reincarnated as princes or prodigies, others were not as blessed.  
Our heroine, who was the lowest in the class, discovered that she was reincarnated as a spider! Now at the bottom of the food chain, she needs to adapt to the current situation with willpower in order to live. Stuck in a dangerous labyrinth filled with monsters, it's eat or be eaten!  
This is the story of a spider doing whatever she can in order to survive!
description.ru: В результате необъяснимого происшествия с участием пикселей класс обычных японских школьников погибает, но перерождается в другом мире. А нашей героине, которая была самой непопулярной в классе, повезло куда больше. Она переродилась пауком в подземелье, полном опасностей. Сможет ли она, используя лишь свою хитрость и удачу, выжить?
description.pt-br: Quando uma misteriosa explosão mata toda uma classe cheia de alunos do ensino médio, as almas de todos na sala de aula são transportadas para um mundo de fantasia e reencarnados. Enquanto alguns estudantes foram reencarnados como príncipes ou prodígios, outros não foram tão abençoados. Nossa heroína, que era a menor na classe, descobriu que ela estava reencarnado como uma aranha!? Agora, na parte inferior da cadeia alimentar, ela precisa se adaptar à situação atual com a força de vontade para viver! Preso em um labirinto perigoso, repleto de monstros, é comer ou ser comido! Esta é a história de uma aranha fazendo tudo o que puder para sobreviver!

altTitles.ja: カナン様はあくまでチョロい

altTitles.en: Kanan-sama Is Easy as Hell!

altTitles.vi: Ác quỷ Kanan dễ đối phó thật đấy

description.en: Kanan is a demon hiding in a high school in the human world to feed on the souls of humans. She sets her sights on a single high school boy, but somehow ends up in a lovers contract with him!? Kanan, who has never been in love, is now filled with new feelings!
description.ja: 人間の魂を喰らうべく、人間界の高校に潜伏する女悪魔・カナン。一人の男子高校生に狙いを定めるが、気づけばなぜか恋人契約を結ぶことに！？ しかし恋なんてしたことのないカナンには、未知な感情ばかりで…！ 甘酸っぱい青春とギャグの嵐！！
description.tr: Kanan, ruhları sömürmek adına liseye sızan dişi bir iblis. Erkek bir öğrenciyi avı olarak seçer ancak... her nasıl oluyorsa ardından kız arkadaşı olmayı kabul eder!? Daha önce aşkı hiç tatmamış olan Kanan, bilinmedik duygularla dolup taşıyor! Saf kalpli iblisimizin ilk aşkını anlatan sevimli romantik komedi başlıyor!
description.vi: Kanan là một con quỷ ẩn náu trong một trường trung học ở thế giới loài người để ăn linh hồn của con người. Cô ấy để ý đến một nam sinh trung học duy nhất, nhưng bằng cách nào đó lại kết thúc với một hợp đồng tình nhân với anh ta !? Kanan, người chưa từng yêu, giờ đang tràn ngập cảm xúc mới! Bộ truyện hài lãng mạn về mối tình đầu của một con quỷ có trái tim thuần khiết, bắt đầu!
description.es-la: Kanan es un demonio femenino que se esconde en un instituto del mundo humano para alimentarse de almas humanas. Se fija en uno de los chicos del instituto, pero de alguna manera acaba firmando un contrato de amante con él. Pero Kanan, que nunca se ha enamorado, está llena de emociones desconocidas... ¡Una tormenta de juventud agridulce y bromas! Comienza una bonita comedia romántica de primer amor sobre una Akuma de corazón puro...
description.pt-br: Kanan é uma demônio que se esconde em uma escola secundária no mundo humano para se alimentar de almas humanas. Ela põe em sua mira em um dos alunos da escola mas de alguma forma acaba assinando um contrato de amante com ele! Mas Kanan que nunca esteve apaixonada antes, está cheia de emoções desconhecidas…! Começa uma comédia romântica do primeiro amor de uma Demônio!

altTitles.en: Jobless Gye Baeksun
Unemployed Gye Baek-soon

description.en: With no savings, average qualifications, and a bank balance consistently below 10,000 won, can the Backbone Breaker Gye Baeksun really escape unemployment?

The last thing Ellin remembers is having to deal with a belligerent customer at her dead-end job. And when she opened her eyes… she’s “Solhwa,” the beautiful fourth concubine to the king of the Xyaran Empire. Between trying to learn the language and eating steak, Ellin’s trying to figure exactly what’s going on. Where is she? How did this happen? And who can she trust: Solhwa’s handsome charismatic childhood friend or the elegant, raven-haired king’s advisor?

After her parents divorced, Lu Yang moved into her mother's good friend's house and began living with the friend's daughter, Su Gui. Su Gui is smart and gentle, like the warm sun in winter, kind yet unobtrusive. She illuminates Lu Yang's life and shines into Lu Yang's heart. Lu Yang saw her as a sister, a friend, and a mother figure... Later on, Lu Yang didn't want to be her little sister anymore, she wanted to date her. However, after realizing that her feelings for Su Gui had changed, Lu Yang did not want to ruin their current relationship. She was afraid to lose her identity as "little sister". She had to change her dependence on Su Gui and distance herself. But after reuniting with Su Gui at work, the suppressed feelings bloomed like a rose, tightly binding Lu Yang and Su Gui together. Was it a long-term scheme or destiny?...

title.en: Isekai Kaeri no Saikyou Tamer, Tsukaima wa Osananajimi

altTitles.ja: 異世界帰りの最強テイマー、使い魔は幼馴染

altTitles.ja-ro: Isekai Kaeri no Saikyou Tamer, Tsukai ma wa Osananajimi

altTitles.en: The Strongest Tamer Returned From Another World With His Childhood Friend as His Familiar

altTitles.id: Penjinak Terkuat Kembali Dari Dunia Lain Dengan Teman Masa Kecilnya sebagai Familiarnya

description.en:
“But I’m powerless without you, my Master.”

After being suddenly summoned to another world and saving that world from a crisis, high school students Wataru and Rumi have safely made it back to the real world. But the real world has been completely transformed! Dungeons are popping up and people have awakened their skills… It’s as if the real world is turning into the world they just left behind…

A dungeon fantasy story where the returnees from another world, the tamer Wataru and his familiar Rumi, mow down everything in their way as the strongest combination that is closer than childhood friends but not quite lovers!
description.ja: 「でも私、ご主人様の渉（わたる）がいないと何もできないよ？」　異世界に突然召喚され、危機を救った高校生の渉と瑠美は、無事に現実世界へと帰還した。しかし、戻ってきたはずの現実世界は様変わりしていて、ダンジョンが発生し、人類はスキルに目覚め、まるで異世界と同じような世界になっていて…　異世界帰りのテイマー・渉と、その使い魔・瑠美。幼馴染以上恋人未満の最強コンビが無双するダンジョンファンタジー

title.en: Suufungo no Mirai ga Wakaru You ni Natta Kedo, Onnagokoro wa Wakaranai.

altTitles.ja: 数分後の未来が分かるようになったけど、女心は分からない。

altTitles.ja-ro: Suufungo no Mirai ga Wakaru You ni Natta Kedo, Onnagokoro ha Wakaranai.

altTitles.en: I Can Now See a Few Minutes Into the Future, but I Still Can't Understand a Woman's Heart.
I Can See a Few Minutes Into the Future, but I Don’t Know What a Woman's Mind Is Like

altTitles.id: Sekarang saya dapat melihat masa depan dalam beberapa menit, tetapi saya tidak dapat memahami hati seorang wanita.

altTitles.pt-br: Agora, posso ver alguns minutos no futuro, mas ainda não consigo entender o coração de uma mulher.

description.en: Arata Itou has the ability to see a few minutes into the future, but the glimpses he sees are always linked to misfortune. With his kind-hearted nature, Arata decides to use this inconvenient power to help girls facing various troubles and prevent their unfortunate futures. However, Arata doesn’t realize that, little by little, the girls are growing fond of him. And he remains oblivious to the quiet rivalries forming between them over his attention.
description.id: Arase Itou bisa melihat beberapa menit ke depan. Namun, masa depan yang ia lihat selalu berhubungan dengan masalah. Arase yang baik hati berusaha menghindari masa depan yang tidak menyenangkan ini, namun pada akhirnya masalah tersebut tetap membuatnya membantu berbagai gadis dengan masalah mereka. Tanpa ia sadari, para gadis mulai menyukainya. Arase tidak menyadari bahwa, diam-diam, para gadis bersaing untuk memperebutkannya.
description.ja:
伊藤新世は数分後の未来が分かる。ただし視える未来は不幸につながるもの。
お人好しな新世はそんな不都合な未来を回避し、様々な悩みを持つ少女を助けることになる。
新世は知らない。いつの間にか、少女たちに好かれていることに。
新世は気づかない。人知れず、少女たちが争っていることに。
description.pt-br: Arata Itou tem a habilidade de ver alguns minutos no futuro, mas as visões que ele tem estão sempre ligadas a infortúnios. Com seu coração bondoso, Arata decide usar esse poder inconveniente para ajudar as garotas que enfrentam diversos problemas e evitar seus futuros infelizes. No entanto, Arata não percebe que, pouco a pouco, as garotas começam a se afeiçoar a ele. E ele continua alheio às rivalidades silenciosas que estão se formando entre elas por causa da sua atenção.

altTitles.vi: Hôm nay công nương toàn năng cũng thấy chán nản

description.en:
Dante Renatus, who had even claimed the throne as the Empress Regent with her excellent swordsmanship, is reincarnated as 'Helena', the daughter of the Duke of Peresca 500 years later. A second life she hadn't wanted. She had already enjoyed everything in her previous life, and had tried everything she had wanted to try. If she has to be reborn, it's just annoying and boring no matter what she does. In the meantime, Prince Caesar visits the duchy to avoid a power struggle, and Helena, who recognizes Caesar's talent, decides to become his swordsmanship teacher.

"I'll make you an Emperor."

It was just something I started thinking about, using the skills of my previous life to train future students and liven up my boring life. But even if you like me, don't you think you like me a bit too much?

---
Dante Lenatous, who'd become the Empress Regent in her past life. Five hundred years later, she's reborn as the youngest daughter of a duchy?

I have already achieved everything I wanted in my past life and done everything I'd wanted, so no matter what I do in this unwanted second round of life, it's annoying and boring.

Since I was reborn anyway, I'd been thinking of teaching young students, but... my disciples love me too much. Was I this talented at teaching?

"If it's for you, Teacher, I can even lead this world to ruin!"

All I'd done was discovered Prince Caesar's talent, so why is he acting like that?!

The teaching of young students by the Max-Level Princess who has no regrets or lingering feelings towards life--!

---
I was an illegitimate daughter abandoned by the promiscuous emperor. From there, I ended up on the street where I learned that I had a knack for the sword. I competed in tournaments, became a mercenary, and I made a name for myself. Just when I had become the talk of the empire, the emperor wanted me back. In return, I demanded to be next in line for the throne. After years of hard work, I finally became empress and died happily. But here I am, alive again. Ugh, can’t a girl be left alone? This time, I’m going to be as lazy as I please!

---

description.fr:
Dante Renatus, qui a pris la place d'empereur grâce à son excellente maîtrise de l' épée s'est réincarné 500 ans plus tard sous le nom d'Helena, la fille du duc de Pereska.

«Je ne voulais pas de cette seconde vie.»

Dante– Helena ne fait que répéter ses actions et ses expériences passées et trouve pour cela les réincarnations ennuyantes et sans intérêts mais lorsque César, le prince, visite la résidence du duc pour échapper à la lutte pour le pouvoir elle lui trouve un talent particulier et décide de devenir son professeur d'épée.

description.hu:
A Max Level hercegnő ma is unatkozik, mint Dante Renatus, aki korábbi életében császár volt. Ötszáz évvel később egy hercegség legfiatalabb lányaként születik újjá? Már mindent elértem, amit szerettem volna az előző életemben, és mindent megtettem, amit akartam, szóval nem számít, mit csinálok életemnek ebben a nem kívánt második körében. Ez bosszantó és unalmas. Amúgy újjászületésem óta arra gondoltam, hogy fiatal diákokat tanítok, de... a tanítványaim túlságosan szeretnek. Ilyen tehetséges voltam a tanításban? – Ha érted, tanár úr, akár tönkretehetem ezt a világot! Csak annyit tettem, hogy felismertem Caesar herceg tehetségét, akkor miért viselkedsz így? Fiatal diákok tanítása a Max Level hercegnőtől, aki nem bánja meg az életet, és nem is marad el az élet iránti érzelme...!

---
Egy törvénytelen lány voltam, akit elhagyott a császár. Onnan az utcára kerültem, ahol megtudtam, hogy értek a kardforgatáshoz. Versenyekre indultam, zsoldos lettem, és nevet szereztem magamnak. Amikor már a birodalomban rólam beszéltek, a császár visszahívott. Cserébe követeltem, hogy én lehessek a következő a trónörökös. Több év kemény munka után végül császárnő lettem, és boldogan haltam meg. De most itt vagyok, újra élek. Ugh, nem lehet egy lányt békén hagyni? Ezúttal olyan lusta leszek, amennyire csak lehet!

---

description.ko:
전생에 무려 황제까지 찍었던 단테 레나투스.
500년 후, 공작가의 막내딸로 환생하다?!

원하지 않던 2회차 인생, 전생에서 누릴 거 다 누렸고,
해 볼 거 다 해봤으니 현생에서 뭘 해도 귀찮고 무료할 뿐이다.

기왕 태어난 거 후학 양성이나 해 볼까 하는데,
……제자들이 날 너무 사랑한다.
내 교육자적 재능이 이렇게 훌륭했던가?

“스승님을 위해서라면, 이 세계도 멸망시킬 수 있어!”

황자 카이사르의 재능을 알아 봤을 뿐인데
왜 그런 방향으로 튀는 거야?!

생의 후회도 미련도 없는 만렙 공녀님의
인생 2회차 후학 양성기―!

description.ru:
Данте Ренатус, которая с помощью своих выдающихся навыков владения мечом заняла даже место императора, перерождается спустя 500 лет как «Хелена», дочь герцога Ферески.2-я жизнь, которой она не желала.В прошлой жизни она насладилась всем, чем хотела, и попробовала всё, что только могла попробовать.После перерождения, что бы она ни делала, любая вещь ей быстро надоедала и казалась скучной.Однако в тот момент ради решения вопроса о власти в герцогство приезжает принц Кайсар. Хелена, рассмотревшая в нём талант, решила стать его учителем фехтования.«Я сделаю тебя императором».Всё это началось из-за желания разукрасить свою жизнь с помощью попыток взрастить подопечного...«Ради мастера я уничтожу весь этот мир».Но отчего-то мне кажется, что я не просто понравилась своему ученику, а прямо запала в его душу.

---

description.uk:
Данте Ренатус, котра в минулому житті посіла почесне місце імператриці завдяки своїй майстерності фехтування, через 500 років переродилась «Хеленою» - донькою герцога Перески.

«Навіщо мені друге життя? Я насолоджувалась тими благами, які мала у попередньому, і спробувала все, чого тільки бажала моя душа. Все те, чим я займаюсь зараз здається мені неймовірно нудним.»

Та в той момент її резиденцію відвідує принц Цезар, задля уникнення боротьби за владу. Герцогиня визнала його талант, приймаючи рішення стати його вчителькою фехтування.

«Я зроблю тебе імператором.»

Це було лише спробою урізноманітнити її марудне життя. Герцогиня мала намір використати навички її минулого життя задля виховання учнів.

«Заради вас, наставнице, я можу знищити весь світ.»

«Щось мені підказує, що я надто сильно подобаюсь своєму учневі.»

altTitles.en: Peach of June
June Peach

description.en:
Leah has been dreaming of a happy marriage. She has had two tries at her luck, but both times the engagements ended. When she got engaged for the third time she was determined that this time it was going to last. Even though she is determined, she keeps seeing a man called Julien with whom she got familiar prior to her engagement. Julien's proposal, combined with his kind personality and handsome face, made her swoon and she agreed to marry him.  

After their wedding, she was enjoying her honeymoon in Julien's estate, where she discovers traces of herself that she didn't know he had. She enters Julien's secret room that he had been hiding from her...

[Official Webtoon](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=59481128)
[Official Novel](https://ridibooks.com/account/login?return_url=%2Fbooks%2F809016837%3F_rdt_sid%3Dauthor%26_rdt_idx%3D4)

Note: The webtoon was released as R15, it's not R19 like the novel

altTitles.en: 君与望心

description.en: Lu Wang Xin is the young miss of Yun Jian Mountain Villa. She fell in love with Xia Hou You. However, after Xia Hou You ascended the throne, he put Lu Wang Xin into the Cold Palace. Heartbroken, Lu Wang Xin died. Reborn at age 16, Lu Wang Xin embarked on the road of revenge…

altTitles.ja: 僕のかわいい娘は双子の賢者 ～特技がデバフの底辺黒魔導士、育てた双子の娘がSランクの大賢者になってしまう～

altTitles.ja-ro: Boku no Kawaii Musume wa Futago no Kenja

altTitles.en: My Lovely Daughters Are Both Sages: I’m a Black Mage Whose Special Skill Is Debuffing, and the Twin Daughters I Raised Become S-Ranked Great Sages!

altTitles.ja: 僕のかわいい娘は双子の賢者

description.en:
Elcan, a dark magician, is fired from his party due to his lack of talent with offensive magic.  As he wandered the streets he came across twins, who were abandoned by their parents. 

"I couldn't be a good dark magician, but I want to make their lives better!" 

He decided to retire from being an adventurer and raise these two girls as his own. And so, he raised his daughters, Corona and Selena. Teaching them black magic and enrolling them in a prestigious magician’s academy. 

After learning more about magic, the girls return to see their father with some important news… They are S-rank Sages?! And they want to form a party with him?! 

A new adventure between a father and his daughters begin!

altTitles.ja: ごぜほたる

description.en: After losing her mother early on, Hotaru, a girl surrounded by warmth and tranquility, finds her life taking a dramatic turn. An unexpected event draws her into the world of “Goze”, setting her on a path through unknown lands with music as her guide. Armed with her talent and a heart full of questions, she embarks on a quest, seeking her missing father and her true calling…!
description.pt-br: Depois de perder a mãe muito cedo, Hotaru, uma garota cercada de calor e tranquilidade, vê sua vida tomar um rumo dramático. Um evento inesperado a leva ao mundo de “Goze”, colocando-a em um caminho por terras desconhecidas, tendo a música como guia. Dotada por seu talento e com o coração cheio de perguntas, ela embarca em uma jornada em busca de seu pai desaparecido e de sua verdadeira vocação...!
